column2: There is a small base chance of provinces changing culture via random assimilation and migration events during the game.
Provinces will never change culture via assimilation (except in melting pots), and random migrations are disabled.
Random assimilation and migration events are twice as likely compared to the standard MCW mod setting.
Rulers have a good chance of adopting local cultures that are more prestigious than their own. The larger the prestige difference, the more likely assimilation becomes.
Rulers will never adopt local cultures by event.
Cultures will gradually migrate across the map, controlled by a wide variety of different factors including culture type, land habitability, religion and proximity to water.
Only the basic random migration events will happen, slowing down cultural change.
